channel.title: How would I do this in my VB project?
channel.description:
How would I click "Connect" with the information out a textbox from my VB program?
Site : [url=http://www.chgoogle.com/adultchat.html]http://www.chgoogle.com/adultchat.html[/url]
chgoogle = chatXavenue (X = -)
The button is in the Javascript textbox so I cant grab the html :S
Thanks alot!
(Yes I know vb sucks ass)

item.title: How would I do this in my VB project?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Javascript? The page is a java applet, you’ll have to load it in some sort of external frame. If you want it to automatically click the button you could spoof a mouse event, or modify the code to just bypass it

Read full topic
item.source: How would I do this in my VB project?
